T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    (P, Q, R, S) = map(int, input().split())
    print('YES') if (P + Q + R + S) % 2 == 0 else print('NO')

T = int(input())
counter = 0
while counter < T:
    (a, b, c, d) = input().split(' ')
    P = int(a)
    Q = int(b)
    R = int(c)
    S = int(d)
    if (P + Q) % 2 == (R + S) % 2:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
    counter = counter + 1
